org.jclouds.ec2
Interface EC2AsyncApi

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
All Known Subinterfaces:
EC2AsyncClient
public interface EC2AsyncApi
extends Closeable

Refer to javadoc for EC2Api, as this interface is the same, except features provide asynchronous return values.

Author:
Adrian Cole
